resources.string: Play Activity.\nThis activity show current song. User can see title, artist, album and album cover. On the bottom of screen are buttons: backward, stop, pause/play and forward. Activity uses ExoPlayer2 to cover playing music functionality.
Playlist Activity.\nThis activity show user playlist. User can add or remove songs, rearrange positions. User can manage playlists: add/remove.

Random Song Activity.\nWhen user click on the button, this Activity play random song from songs library. User can see: title, artist, album and album cover. User can click Next button to play next random song. Activity uses ExoPlayer2 to cover playing music functionality.
Payment Activity.\nActivity uses Android Pay API to let user to buy premium songs from app library.
